net.canarymod.api.entity

Interface Explosive

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Creeper, EnderCrystal, LargeFireball, TNTMinecart, TNTPrimed, WitherSkull

    public interface Explosive
    Interface for manipulating Explosive devices
    Author:
    Chris (damagefilter), Jason (darkdiplomat)

    • Method Summary

      • setCanDamageWorld

        void setCanDamageWorld(boolean canDamage)
        Sets whether the explosion can damage the world: blocks
        Parameters:
        canDamage - true if can damage entities; false if not

        boolean canDamageWorld()
        Gets whether the explosion can damage the world
        Returns:

      • getFuse

        int getFuse()
        Gets the 'length' of the fuse
        Returns:
        the ticks before the fuse is expired

      • setFuse

        void setFuse(int fuse)
        Sets the 'length' of the fuse
        Parameters:
        fuse - the amount of ticks to set the fuse to

      • increaseFuse

        Increases the fuse length
        Parameters:
        increase - the amount of ticks to increase the fuse by

        Decreases the fuse length
